headline: Dominion Energy Q3 Earnings & Revenues Beat, '25 EPS Guidance Narrowed
summary: D beats third-quarter earnings and revenue estimates, boosts profits across segments and narrows its 2025 EPS outlook.

headline: NiSource Announces $1.5 Billion At-The-Market (ATM) Equity Issuance Program Through 2028
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., October 31, 2025--NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI) ("NiSource", "we" and "our") announced today that it has established an "at-the-market" equity offering program under which NiSource may sell shares of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share ("Common Stock"), having an aggregate gross sales price of up to $1.5 billion through December 31, 2028 (the "Offering").

raw.headline: NiSource Announces $1.5 Billion At-The-Market (ATM) Equity Issuance Program Through 2028
raw.summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., October 31, 2025--NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI) ("NiSource", "we" and "our") announced today that it has established an "at-the-market" equity offering program under which NiSource may sell shares of its common stock, par value $0.01 per share ("Common Stock"), having an aggregate gross sales price of up to $1.5 billion through December 31, 2028 (the "Offering").
